text: Great talk last night <@U04BD6KB1>, sorry I had to bail early. I assume that video of yours will make its way online soon? (please?)

thanks <@U03V2PZUB>, it'll go up via the normal process with Jamie but I think I may also push some condensed footage up myself (considering how much is in video format). I'm also planning to add some video instruction to the Demo site for the redux addon (next weekend as this weekend I have friends visiting). <https://ember-redux.firebaseapp.com/>.

text: if anyone's interested I've put "video" part of last night's talk on vimeo: <https://vimeo.com/kensnyder/ember-redux-core>

text: Also anyone interested in real-time databases but uncomfortable with proprietary solutions could also check out <https://telepat.io/>

attachments.title: Build Real-Time Apps with Telepat
attachments.text: Telepat is an API centric real-time backend that instantly delivers data, updates and messages to and from web, mobile or IoT apps.

text: I think they see RethinkDB's shutdown as a bit of an opportunity :slightly_smiling_face:
